node.detail_zh: 患者是 #259 患者的母親，無外遊。 3 月 18 日發燒、咳嗽及喉嚨痛，現正於博愛醫院留醫。
node.detail_en: The patient is the mother of #259 who has no travel history.  She started having fever, coughing and sore throat on Mar 18.  She is now staying in Pok Oi Hospital.
node.classification_zh: 可能本地個案的密切接觸者

groups.name_en: Lan Kwai Fong/Discovery Bay wedding banquet
groups.description_zh: 3 月 14 日一個在愉景灣酒店「海濱白教堂」舉行的婚宴，出席人數超過 80 人，其後多名出席者先後確診。當中有確診婚宴賓客曾到蘭桂坊消遺。
groups.description_en: Numerous attendees - out of over 80 - were tested positive for coronavirus after having attended a wedding banquet at Auberge Discovery Bay on Mar 14.

node.location_en: Yiu Foo House, Tin Yiu Estate, Tin Shui Wai

node.remarks_zh: 出席於「海濱白教堂」的婚禮
node.remarks_en: Attended a wedding banquet in White Chapel
